wikipedia_page.main:
David Walker (15 October 1941 – 21 April 2015) was an English professional footballer who played as a central defender for Burnley and Southampton.
He died on 21 April 2015 at the age of 73.

response: Dave Walker (1941 - 2015), born in Colne, became a professional footballer for Burnley F.C. and Southampton F.C.

* Dave Walker, Scottish former professional footballer, played for St. Mirren FC in the 1959 Scottish Cup Final
